entry.title: $2495 // NO FEE - QUIET ONE BEDROOM IN BROWNSTONE
entry.content:
Available FEBRUARY 15.
Approximately 500 sq. ft, this is a classic one bedroom apartment on the 5th floor in a charming walk-up brownstone.

The living room is 15' x 12' with a storage closet and two large windows facing north, looking over the garden.

There is a lot of natural light with SKYLIGHTS (one in the kitchen and one in the bathroom) lending a peaceful and quiet feel to the apartment.

11' ceilings throughout make this apartment feel extra spacious, and built-in ceiling fans in the living room and bedroom make it very comfortable.

The kitchen has all major appliances and has built-in fold-down shelving for extra work space.

The bedroom is 8.5 x 12 with a large clothes closet and window with the garden view. The bedroom will comfortably fit a queen-size bed.

HARDWOOD FLOORS throughout.

Electricity, Cooking Gas, Heat and Hot Water are ALL INCLUDED in the rent.

The apartment is located on a beautiful tree lined block, West 76th St. between Riverside Dr. and West End. It is half block from the park, and a short walk to the best shopping on the West Side: Fairway, Citerella, Zabar's, and Trader Joe's.

West 72nd is an express stop on the subway, so you are just minutes from midtown.

Sorry no dogs, but 1 cat is okay.

This is a no fee / no broker listing. The rental agent works exclusively at this property.

Please contact Donna at show contact info to make an appointment for showing.
Sorry no emails. Call only.
